alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 6:50PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wayne County through 715 PM EDT... At 649 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Screven, or 9 miles southwest of Jesup, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jesup, Screven and Odum. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
